Text: Something Old / Something New:  It contains two songs originally recorded for the band's fourth studio album, "Astoria" (2015), and two tracks that pre-date the recording of their debut studio album, "Fix Me" (2006), from their Self-Titled EP "Marianas Trench" (2002).
